translated: Umberto Boccioni was born October 19, 1882 in Reggio Calabria and died 17 August 1916 (to 34) in Verona was an Italian painter of the twentieth century belonging to the futurist current.
original: Umberto Boccioni né le 19 octobre 1882 à Reggio Calabria et mort le 17 août 1916 (à 34 ans) à Vérone est un peintre italien du XXe siècle appartenant au courant futuriste.
